data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of San Juan.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Juan, Argentina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of San Juan, Argentina who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 95 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in San Juan, Argentina.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide seekers in San Juan, Argentina to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of San Juan you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in San Juan, Argentina, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in San Juan who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in San Juan, Argentina today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
